General.Name: Mitra International Resources
General.Description: PT Mitra International Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides transportation services in Indonesia. The company offers land transportation services; and logistics and warehousing services, including loading and unloading of goods. It also produces flat-deck trucks, dump trucks, boxes, and wing boxes. The company was formerly known as PT Mitra Rajasa and changed its name to PT Mitra International Resources Tbk in October 2009. PT Mitra International Resources Tbk was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Grha Mitra Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12510
